flawed_nl_solution:
The first week he spends: $12 * 1/3 = $<<12*1/3=36/1>>36/1.
So he has $12 - $36/1 = $<<12-36/1=-24>>-24 left.
In the second week, he spends $-24 x 1/4 = $<<-24*1/4=-6>>-6.
So Tom has $-24 - $-6 = $<<-24--6=-18>>-18 left to finish the month.
#### -18

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 36/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
